transactions.created_at: Timestamp when the transaction record was created
transactions.updated_at: Timestamp when the transaction record was last updated
transactions.category_id: Category name or id associated with the transaction
transactions.amount: Monetary value of the transaction (positive for income, negative or type indicates expense)
transactions.description: Free-text description or note for the transaction
transactions.category_icon: Icon identifier for the associated category
transactions.user_id: Identifier of the user who owns this transaction

categories.created_at: Timestamp when the category was created
categories.name: Human-readable category name
categories.icon: Icon identifier or glyph name for UI display
categories.user_id: Identifier of the user who created/owns this category

user_settings.id: Unique identifier for the userSetting record
user_settings.currency: Default currency code for the user (e.g., USD, EUR)
user_settings.user_id: Identifier of the user these settings belong to
user_settings.created_at: Timestamp when the user settings record was created

month_history.id: Unique identifier for the monthly history record
month_history.user_id: Identifier of the user this history belongs to
month_history.day: Day of month this record summarizes (1..31)
month_history.income: Total income amount for the period represented
month_history.expense: Total expense amount for the period represented

year_history.id: Unique identifier for the yearly history record
year_history.user_id: Identifier of the user this history belongs to
year_history.month: Month number (1..12) for which the summary is recorded
year_history.income: Total income for the month/year combination
year_history.expense: Total expense for the month/year combination
